explains: v. 延伸；扩大，延长；持续；包括，波及；提供，表示；伸出；使竭尽全力；对……估价
wordGroup: extend one's business 扩大其营业

sentences.en: The caves extend for some 12 miles.
There are plans to extend the no-smoking area.
sentences.cn: 现已有扩大无烟区的计划。

sentences.en: The meat is chemically treated to extend shelf life.
sentences.cn: 猪肉经过化学处理以延长保存期。
